means: 意外事故，不合适宜，令人尴尬的事

sentence.Network_en: He was briefly arrested in Rome after a contretemps with Italian police.
sentence.Network_cn: 他曾因和意大利警方发生争执而在罗马被短暂拘留。

sentence.Network_en: He tried to smooth over his contretemps with the policeman.
sentence.Network_cn: 他试图消除他与警察之间的冲突和误会.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(30) ... contredanse 对面舞 contretemps 意外事故 contribute to 捐献.
奥运英语体育词汇... ... 203.同侧的半圆防守： half-counter 204.假进攻接防守： contretemps 205.变换防守： change parry.
against daylightcontretemps 不测之灾祸;意外事故;延误an awkward clash; a delay
基本前缀（1-260）表空间位置、方位关系 ... contravention 违反； contretemps 不测 counteraction 反作用；.

list.abs: it was during this illness that the first real contretemps occurred .就在这场病里，第一次真正不幸的事故发生了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (originally as a fencing term, denoting a thrust made at an inopportune moment): French, originally motion out time', from contre- 'against' + temps 'time'

entry.tran: 令人尴尬的小争吵;口角
entry.def: A contretemps is a small disagreement that is rather embarrassing.

example.ex: He was briefly arrested in Rome after a contretemps with Italian police.
example.tran: 他曾因和意大利警方发生争执而在罗马被短暂拘留。

sentences.sentence: "he tried to smooth over his contretemps with the policeman"

auth_sentence.content: The son...took every little contretemps as if it were a tragedy.
auth_sentence.res_content: The son...took every little contretemps as if it were a tragedy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The son...took every little contretemps as if it were a tragedy.

auth_sentence.content: But thanks to Mr Blunkett, people may now be paying more attention to the fall-out of the weekend's contretemps instead.
auth_sentence.res_content: But thanks to Mr Blunkett, people may now be paying more attention to the fall-out of the weekend's contretemps instead.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But thanks to Mr Blunkett, people may now be paying more attention to the fall-out of the weekend's contretemps instead.

auth_sentence.content: Democrats say they don't see the contretemps as a sign the party will become monolithic on abortion.
